siteMetadata.title: 你可以改变我的想法吗？
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览Reddit-Change My View的热帖

previous.excerpt:
I see every day advertisements advocating for more funding for inner city
schools because they don't have adequate access to STEM and computer science
education. However, with living in a rural area of a heavily rural state I've
only ever seen 1 person or advertisement advocating for rural…
previous.title: CMV: Those who call for education help don't care about Rural Schools.

localize.title: [改变我的想法]：那些呼吁教育帮助的人并不关心乡村学校。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我每天都看到广告鼓吹给市中心提供更多的资金。
学校，因为他们没有足够的机会学习STEM和计算机科学
教育。然而，由于生活在一个以农村为主的州的农村地区，我
只见过1个人或广告宣传农村…

localize.title: [改變我的想法]：那些呼籲教育幫助的人並不關心鄉村學校。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我每天都看到廣告鼓吹給市中心提供更多的資金。
學校，因爲他們沒有足夠的機會學習STEM和計算機科學
教育。然而，由於生活在一個以農村爲主的州的農村地區，我
只見過1個人或廣告宣傳農村…

next.excerpt:
By saying psychedelic drugs - I mean 5HT2A receptor agonists: LSD and
psilocybin.

 * These substances are orders of magnitude less harmful to the body than
   alcohol. In fact, in recreational doses they haven't ever been shown to
   possess have any poisonous qualities at all, meanwhile alcohol is…
next.title: CMV:Psychedelic drugs are significantly less harmful than alcohol - both in absolute terms for the society in large and in relative terms for majority of individuals.

localize.title: [改变我的想法]：迷幻药物的危害性要比酒精小得多-无论是对整个社会的绝对危害，还是对大多数个人的相对危害。

我说的迷幻药物-我是指5HT2A受体激动剂：LSD和
裸盖菇素。

酒精。事实上，在娱乐剂量上，他们从来没有被展示过
有没有任何有毒的品质，同时酒精是…
